snippet.title: WorldShaper Idle will be released on Steam!
snippet.description:
WorldShaper Idle will be expanded into a full game, and you can now wishlist it on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2562020/WorldShaper_Idle/

If you wishlist the game, you'll help me out a lot by showing the Steam algorithm that people are interested in the game, and you'll get a notification when the game is out!

The full game will contain a ton of new content, including at least one new race (the Elves), which offers a complete new tileset to play with. There'll also be a tile journal and much more.

The game will also include some great new music by Stijn Cappetijn. The cover art image was drawn by Mareike Reh.

I don't know the release date yet. It'll still take quite a while to finish up all the content, balance everything and make the game as good as it can be! I will of course keep you up to date. The game will also be released on Android and iOS.
